job.title: Senior Software Engineer, IdentityAI
job.description: pbrbrpAt SailPoint we do things differently We understand that a funloving work environment can be highly motivating and productive When smart people work on intriguing problems and they enjoy coming to work each day they accomplish great things together  With that philosophy weve assembled the best identity team in the world that is passionate about the power of identitybrbrpAs the fastestgrowing independent identity and access management IAM provider SailPoint helps hundreds of global organizations securely and effectively deliver and manage user access from any device to data and applications residing in the data center on mobile devices and in the cloud brbrpThe companys innovative product portfolio offers customers an integrated set of core services including identity governance provisioning and access management delivered onpremises or from the cloud IAMasaservicebrbrpSailPoint is seeking wellrounded backend engineers who are passionate about building and delivering reliable scalable microservices and infrastructure for SaaS products  You will be part of an agile team that is tasked with building components and services that will be used in our IdentityAI productbrbrpResponsibilitiesbrbrulliDeliver efficient maintainable robust microservicesliliProduce designs rough estimates and implement features based on product requirementsliliCollaborate with peers on designs code reviews and testingliliProduce unit and endtoend tests to improve code quality and allow for continuous deliveryliliEnsure that features are properly deployed into production and generate metricsliulpRequirementsbrbrulli5 years of professional software development experienceliliJava or other objectoriented design and implementation experience including working knowledge of standard libraries and design patternsliliExperience in implementing and using RESTful APIs for an APIfirst application architectureliliGreat communication skillsliliExperience building microservices and knowledge of microservice patternsliulpPreferredbrbrulliExperience with AWSliliExperience with Continuous DeliveryliliExperience with cloud message APIs and push notificationsliliExperience with Docker Kubernetes and KafkaliulpCompensation and benefitsbrbrulliExperience a smallcompany atmosphere with bigcompany benefitsliliCompetitive pay 401k with opportunitiesliliEnjoy a healthy worklife balance with flexible hours familyfriendly company events and charitable workliulpAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without
